title.rendered: Rukmani Devi students spend a day with Smile kids

content.rendered:
Children from Rukmani Devi Public School, Pitampura, visited a Mission Education centre in Delhi, to make some new friends. Such interactions between the privileged and underprivileged children are encouraged by Smile Foundation under its Child for Child programme, to develop feelings of empathy and understanding between them.

Around 30 students from Rukmani Devi, along with their teachers, were present during the visit and had a fun filled day as they engaged in activities like games, songs and poem recitation with the Smile kids, and exchanged learning tips.
